name: Slime (itch) (EinBurgbauer)
description:
A platformer game about Slimes that stick to walls and tend to die a lot. Throw yourself through the 40+ levels (and ideally not into spikes). Beat your own best times or create your own level packs using the in game editor tools.

This game is still in development so some feedback or bug reports are highly appreciated, feel free to post below.

Listen to the soundtrack on soundcloud: Astowo - Slime OST
